EmailTemplate.subject: RE: GSA Schedule (1353439524.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Heidi, If you want to bid for RFI's using FedBizOpps <https://www.fbo.gov/> you can bid under our GSA number. <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_GSA_Price_List.pdf> A Also I can refer you to discussed Judy Bradt who may be a helpful contact for you regarding working with the federal government. Please see her contact information below:Judy Bradt | CEO, Summit Insight <http://www.summitinsight.com/> | Strategic Advisors for Government Contracts494 N Pickett St, Alexandria VA 22304 | 703.627.1074judy.bradt@summitinsight.com <mailto:judy.bradt@summitinsight.com> | Connect With Me On LinkedIn <http://www.linkedin.com/in/judybradt> | Follow Me On Twitter <http://twitter.com/judybradt> | Visit My Blog <http://www.sell2usgov.com/> | Find me On FaceBook <http://www.facebook.com/SummitInsight>Author of "Government Contracts Made Easier <http://www.governmentcontractsmadeeasier.com/>" -- now available! Good luck!Sara__________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. -----Original Message----- From: Heidi Everett [mailto:heidijeverett@gmail.com] Sent: Tuesday, November 20, 2012 2:21 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: GSA Schedule Hi Sara: Can you send some information on how I can go about using the GSA Schedule through MBO Partners? Thanks,Heidi
